summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Soil Health Monitoring System. All backend APIs and frontend features working correctly with realistic agricultural data patterns.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about HTML structure (span inside tbody)

passed_tests: All 6 backend API endpoints (status, npk-predictions, waterlogging-risk, history, alerts, fertilization-history)
Dashboard page loading and data display
NPK Management page with charts and predictions
Waterlogging Monitor with risk assessment and forecast
History page with parameter selection and CSV export
